name: Learn Python
description: Programming fundamentals for researchers — data manipulation, visualization, and workflows

resources.why: Git, shell, debugging — skills they don't teach in PhD programs

name: Learn Statistics
description: Hypothesis testing, inference, and distributions — the foundation for empirical work

resources.name: StatQuest (Josh Starmer)
resources.why: Visual intuition for stats — the 'Bill Nye of Statistics'

resources.name: Seeing Theory (Brown)
resources.why: Beautiful interactive visualizations for building intuition

resources.name: Think Stats
resources.why: Programming-first approach with real datasets

resources.name: Scipy.stats Documentation
resources.why: Reference for distributions and tests

name: Learn ML
description: Prediction, tree models, and cross-validation — for forecasting and pattern recognition

resources.name: Andrew Ng's ML Specialization
resources.why: THE beginner starting point - visual-first, 4.8M learners

resources.name: Google ML Crash Course
resources.why: Free interactive exercises from Google

resources.name: fast.ai Practical Deep Learning
resources.why: Code first, teaches math along the way

resources.name: Introduction to Statistical Learning
resources.why: Free textbook with Python code

packages.name: scikit-learn

name: Learn Causal Inference

resources.why: DAGs that don't suck, readable and modern

resources.name: Causal Inference: The Mixtape

resources.why: 1M+ subscribers, accessible ongoing learning

resources.name: Intercom: RICE Framework

name: Learn Experimentation
description: A/B testing, power analysis, and statistical rigor — bridge your training to industry experiments

resources.name: Trustworthy Online Controlled Experiments (Kohavi)
resources.why: THE industry bible — Kohavi (Microsoft), Tang (Google), Xu (LinkedIn)

resources.name: Evan Miller's A/B Testing Tools
resources.why: Interactive calculators — understand stats under the hood

resources.name: Understanding CUPED (Matteo Courthoud)
resources.why: Most accessible CUPED explanation — derives variance reduction clearly

resources.name: Netflix Tech Blog: Experimentation Series
resources.why: Platform architecture, sequential testing at scale

resources.name: Uber: Supercharging A/B Testing
resources.why: Rebuilding experimentation — 1,000+ concurrent experiments

packages.name: GrowthBook SDK
packages.why: Feature flags and experiments — open source

name: Learn SQL

resources.name: DataLemur
resources.why: Real DS interview questions with business context

packages.name: duckdb

resources.name: LeetCode Explore: Data Structures

name: Learn Optimization (OR)
description: Linear programming, convex optimization, and combinatorial methods — solve pricing, scheduling, and allocation problems

resources.name: MIT 15.053: Optimization Methods
resources.why: Beginner-friendly LP — geometry and visualization before algebra

resources.name: QuantEcon: Linear Programming
resources.why: Python notebooks from Nobel Laureate Sargent — economics applications

resources.why: SciPy and PuLP with clear explanations — includes MIP

resources.name: CVXPY Short Course
resources.why: Hands-on convex optimization in Python — from Boyd's group

resources.name: Convex Optimization (Boyd & Vandenberghe)
resources.why: The bible — free online, universally cited

name: Learn Agentic Workflows
description: Build AI agents that reason, plan, and execute — tool use, multi-agent systems, and orchestration

resources.name: AI Agents in LangGraph (DeepLearning.AI)
resources.why: Build agents from scratch with Harrison Chase

resources.why: Design patterns from Claude's creators — best practitioner guide

resources.name: LangGraph Documentation

name: Learn Forecasting
description: Time series analysis, demand forecasting, and prediction — ARIMA, Prophet, and modern ML methods for business planning

resources.name: Forecasting: Principles and Practice (Python)
resources.why: THE definitive resource — Hyndman's book with Nixtla Python code

resources.name: MIT 14.384: Time Series Analysis
resources.why: Graduate-level — ARMA, VAR, cointegration, Kalman filters

resources.name: statsforecast Documentation
resources.why: Nixtla's AutoARIMA — 19x faster than pmdarima

resources.name: Prophet Critique (Sean Taylor)
resources.why: Must-read from Prophet co-creator — honest limitations

resources.name: Uber: Forecasting Introduction
resources.why: ARIMA, Holt-Winters, Theta — insights from M4 winner Smyl

resources.name: DoorDash: ELITE Ensemble Learning
resources.why: Accuracy vs compute tradeoffs — Ray for distributed forecasting

resources.name: Amazon: Chronos Foundation Model
resources.why: Zero-shot forecasting with T5 architecture — state of the art

resources.name: sktime: Unified Framework
resources.why: scikit-learn API for time series — NeurIPS paper

resources.name: Penn State STAT 510
resources.why: Free graduate course — ARIMA, spectral analysis, ARCH/GARCH

packages.name: prophet
packages.why: Meta's additive model — good for business seasonality

packages.name: statsmodels
packages.why: SARIMAX, VAR, state space — classical econometrics
